title: ISic001070. I.Sicily inscription 001070
body:
Facsimile Images

a
Σόσιος Βαχχύλος
διάκων ἐνθάδε
κῖτε ἀ̣νεπαύσετο
μηνὶ Νοβενβρίῳ
5ἀπὸ καλανδῶ(ν) ((·)) ιγ´ ((·))
b
Ἀντ(ωνεία) Εὐφρ̣ο̣σ̣[ύ-]
νη ἀνεπαύ[σα]τ(ο)
τῇ πρὸ ια´ κ(αλανδῶν) Δεκεμβρ(ίων)

Apparatus criticus

Text after principally after Ferrua, checked against poor photographs; ΒυχχύλοςKaibel, Griesheimer
a.2bis: (Αν)Griesheimer, followed by Paci
a.4bis: [[κ(αὶ)]]Griesheimer, followed by Paci
a.5: καλανδῶν γall editors except Ferrua

translation

commentary

The second part is written almost as a graffito, and is assumed to be for the wife of the man recorded in the first part.

  • 39.0994 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10000796
  • 1991.0762 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001282
  • 4.9517 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001252
  • Manganaro 1993 589 fig.32 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001827
  • Ferrua 1989 no.500 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001995
  • Griesheimer 1989 161-162 no.11 fig.11-12 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001939
  • Paci 2005 no.2 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001688
